question: Who has won the 2018 women's singles Indonesia Masters badminton tournament?
explanation: Tai Tzu Ying of Taiwan has won the 2018 women\'s singles Indonesia Masters badminton tournament by defeating Saina Nehwal in the final by 9-21, 13-21 in Jakarta. With this win, Tai Tzu has now defeated the former world No.1 nine times in their last 10 meetings.
